goal.en: Introduce statistics in the context of contemporary business. Emphasizing statistical literacy in thinking and how to apply its concepts with real data and examples to develop a deeper conceptual understanding.
goal.ch: Introduce statistics in the context of contemporary business. Emphasizing statistical literacy in thinking and how to apply its concepts with real data and examples to develop a deeper conceptual understanding.

content.en:
Chapter 7. Inferences Based on a Single Sample: Tests of Hypotheses
Chapter 8. Inferences Based on Two Samples: Confidence Intervals and Tests of Hypotheses
Chapter 9. Design of Experiments and Analysis of Variance
Chapter 10. Categorical Data Analysis
Chapter 11. Simple Linear Regression
content.ch:
Chapter 7. Inferences Based on a Single Sample: Tests of Hypotheses
Chapter 8. Inferences Based on Two Samples: Confidence Intervals and Tests of Hypotheses
Chapter 9. Design of Experiments and Analysis of Variance
Chapter 10. Categorical Data Analysis
Chapter 11. Simple Linear Regression

textbook.en: Title: Statistics for Business and Economics (2022, 14th Edition) Author: James T. McClave , P. George Benson, Terry Sincich Publisher: Pearson
textbook.ch: Title: Statistics for Business and Economics (2022, 14th Edition) Author: James T. McClave , P. George Benson, Terry Sincich Publisher: Pearson

grading.en: Homework, Exercise, Participation, and Attendance: 35%; Midterm Exam: 30%; Final Exam: 35%
grading.ch: Homework, Exercise, Participation, and Attendance: 35%; Midterm Exam: 30%; Final Exam: 35%

flex_desc.en: Students can summarize what they learn in this semester and check their final exam papers.
flex_desc.ch: 學生可以整理本學期所上課之內容，及查詢期末考卷
